title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for setting up appropriate test

1 point is earned for correct conclusion (ratio test must include limit)

1 point is earned for tests both endpoints, invoking Alt. Series Test

By Ratio Test,

| (−1) n+1 4 x 2 n+3 2n+3 . 2n+1 (−1) n 4 x 2n+1 |= 2n+1 2n+3 x 2 lim n→∞ 2n+1 2n+3 x 2 = x 2 ;  x 2 <1 for −1<x<1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@815C@

descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for setting up appropriate test

1 point is earned for correct conclusion (ratio test must include limit)

1 point is earned for tests both endpoints, invoking Alt. Series Test

By Ratio Test,

| (−1) n+1 4 x 2 n+3 2n+3 . 2n+1 (−1) n 4 x 2n+1 |= 2n+1 2n+3 x 2 lim n→∞ 2n+1 2n+3 x 2 = x 2 ;  x 2 <1 for −1<x<1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@815C@
